<root><template><title>Command</title><part><name>Comments</name>=<value>
____________________________________________________________________________________________

</value></part><part><name index="1"/><value> arma3</value></part><part><name>Game name</name>=<value>
</value></part><part><name index="2"/><value>1.50</value></part><part><name>Game version</name>=<value>
</value></part><part><name>arg</name>=<value> global</value></part><part><name>Multiplayer Arguments</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name>gr1</name>=<value> Object Manipulation </value></part><part><name>GROUP1</name>=<value>
____________________________________________________________________________________________

</value></part><part><name index="3"/><value> Return current level of damage for a specific Hit Point (specified by its hit part index). All hit points can be obtained with [[getAllHitPointsDamage]] command.
* 0: no damage
* 1: full damage </value></part><part><name>DESCRIPTION</name>=<value>
____________________________________________________________________________________________

</value></part><part><name index="4"/><value> vehicle '''getHitIndex''' hitPartIndex</value></part><part><name>SYNTAX</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name>p1</name>=<value> vehicle : [[Object]] - vehicle to be queried </value></part><part><name>PARAMETER1</name>=<value>
</value></part><part><name>p2</name>=<value> hitPartIndex: [[Number]] - hit part index of the Hit Point</value></part><part><name>PARAMETER2</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name index="5"/><value> [[Number]] (or, prior to Arma 3 v1.93.145625, [[Nothing]] when invalid input is given) </value></part><part><name>RETURNVALUE</name>=<value>
____________________________________________________________________________________________

</value></part><part><name>x1</name>=<value> <code>[[vehicle]] [[player]] [[getHitIndex]] 3;</code> </value></part><part><name/>=<value>

</value></part><part><name index="6"/><value> [[getAllHitPointsDamage]], [[setHitIndex]], [[setHitPointDamage]], [[getHitPointDamage]], [[setHit]], [[getHit]], [[setDamage]], [[damage]] </value></part><part><name>SEEALSO</name>=<value>

</value></part></template>
